name: PainTableau
description:
A game by Ari and Liam for PaintJam2020. The theme this year was the painting "Tableau 1" by Piet Mondrian. He believed that 3D space is deceptive, so we made a platformer that explores the perception of 3D space. 

"The rhythm of relations of color and size makes the absolute appear in the relativity of time and space." - Piet Mondrian
